name: Eevee GX
author: PLANETA Otani

abilities.name: Ascension DNA
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), if you have a Pokémon in your hand that evolves from Eevee, you may put that card onto this Pokémon to evolve it. Before evolving, heal all damage from this Pokémon. You can’t use this Ability during your first turn or on the turn this Pokémon was put into play.

attacks.name: Joy Maker GX
attacks.effect: Put 3 cards from your discard pile into your hand. (You can’t use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

rule_box: When your Pokémon-GX is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.
